verses.roman:
tabe svarūpa-gosāñi saṅge lañā bhakta-gaṇa
deuṭi jvāliyā karena prabhura anveṣaṇa

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; saṅge—with him; lañā—taking; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; deuṭi—lamp; jvāliyā—burning; karena—does; prabhura—for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; anveṣaṇa—searching.
translation: Then Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī lit a torch, and went out with all the devotees to search for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
